channel.title: Geraldine Rojas on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Geraldine Rojas on Simba Tango

item.title: 10 Years Anniversary
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: It is exactly 10 years since I first put a hesitating foot on a festival dance floor today. So I thought it would be fun to refresh my memories and reflect a bit on where I was then, and what I still keep from that time. We were just entering the local tango scene, and didn’t really know anything about tango at all. We had seen Carlos Saura’s Tango, maybe Sally Potter’s Tango Lesson, but probably not yet at that time.

item.title: Confiteria La Ideal en BBC
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: Another good documentary about tango. I enjoyed it a lot. Some of the interesting scenes are available on youtube, but the documentary itself was quite hard to get hold of. As far as I could determine, it is not available for sale, not even on ebay, so you better know one of them pirates or use your imagination ;-) I am quite impressed by how ordinary dancers are able to express what tango means to them.
